images.alt: Background image of a serene yoga studio
images.description: A full-width background image for the hero section showing a serene yoga studio or meditation space with soft lighting. Sets the tranquil tone for the entire site.
A small circular avatar image of a woman (Laura García) displayed alongside her testimonial quote. Adds credibility and a personal touch to the testimonial section.
A small circular avatar image of a man (Carlos Rodríguez) displayed alongside his testimonial quote. Adds credibility and a personal touch to the testimonial section.
A small circular avatar image of a woman (Marta Fernández) displayed alongside her testimonial quote. Adds credibility and a personal touch to the testimonial section.
A medium-sized image illustrating holistic therapies, possibly showing a massage, reiki session, or other therapy treatment. Used as a visual representation of the therapy services offered.

An image of a person performing a yoga pose or a yoga class in session. Used to illustrate different yoga classes offered by the studio. Some instances of this image are loading correctly while others are not.
A photo of the Mandala Ourense yoga studio interior, showing the practice space. This image successfully loads on the About page and provides visitors with a visual of the actual studio space.
A gradient or textured background image for the call-to-action section. Enhances the visual appeal of the section prompting visitors to take action (book a class/contact the studio).

images.alt: Ana García - Profesora de Hatha Yoga
images.description: Portrait photo of a female yoga teacher (Ana García) who teaches Hatha Yoga. Used on the About page to introduce the studio's teaching staff.

images.alt: Carlos Martínez - Profesor de Daoyin Yoga
images.description: Portrait photo of a male yoga teacher (Carlos Martínez) who teaches Daoyin Yoga. Used on the About page to introduce the studio's teaching staff.
Portrait photo of a female meditation instructor (Lucía Fernández). Used on the About page to introduce the studio's teaching staff.
